title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official CLI and server for running large language models locally (Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, etc.) with Docker-like pull/run UX.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage local models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same features as Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain adapter giving chains, agents, and retrieval pipelines access to Ollama models.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI for any Ollama model; runs entirely in browser or Docker.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with builder-style API and Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot chat pane.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Ready-to-run RAG stack using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + Streamlit for PDF Q&A.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama server and models on Kubernetes with autoscaling and PVC caching.

title: ollama-cli-chat
summary: Terminal UI (built with Textual) for multi-session chat, history, and model switching.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Cross-platform desktop app (Tauri + React) for chatting with Ollama models offline.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaEmbedder nodes for pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained .NET SDK for Ollama with async enumerable streaming.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that caches and serves Ollama models inside CI pipelines for reproducible LLM tests.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate exposing typed async client for Ollama’s REST API plus CLI example.

title: ollama-laravel
summary: Laravel service provider wrapping ollama-php with facades, queues, and Artisan commands.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that brings local Ollama models into any server with slash commands.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app for private or channel-based chats powered by Ollama models.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin enabling inline LLM prompts, note summarization, and semantic search via Ollama.

title: ollama-macos-menu
summary: Native macOS menu-bar app for starting/stopping Ollama server and switching models from the toolbar.
